name: Embellished Arm Warmers I Flower Print Of  Primroses I Baroque Gothic Romantic I OH PRIMULA!
description:
The eye-catcher on these baroque arm warmers is an irregular embellishment of bright violet Primroses that follows the shape of the flower petals. A bouquet of pink and wine red Primroses mixed with a trellis design of yellow Oxlips on fir green background contributes to a not-so-sweet rather dark look.

In wintertime's festive season these fingerless gloves look stunning combined with metalic gold, black lace or a broquade apparel. Emphasize their lavish luxe look by always standing close to a chandelier.
Once springtime comes this ladies accessory reveals it's other twinkle-toed side: pair them with a checkered short-sleeved blouse, a Peter Pan collar or a light yellow girlish dress.

I encourage you to play around with the item's length. You can either wear these arm warmers at full length.  Or slip them down beneath the elbow for a different look. This way they look great with ¾ sleeves. 

The print on these fingerless gloves looks like painted, but it actually is a collage of digital images which I personally took of Primroses I planted on the balcony and Oxlips I saw in the woods. The floral contour edging is hand-cut.

I digitally print my original textile designs on a soft, sophisticated knitted polyamide material which perfectly serves the modern requirements for easy wear and easy care. The cuff on the upper end is invisible and encloses the arm without tightening. 

I developed, designed, printed, sewed and eventually photographed this item with utmost care. As with any handmade item in limited editions my pieces may have slight inconsistencies. Their colors might appear differently in reality than on your monitor. 


MATERIAL
Main: 100% Polyamide, Oeko Tex Standard 100 certified, fabric provides stretch
Hem: 100% Polyester

MEASURES AND HOW TO MEASURE
Length:                                   approx. 36 cm/ 15 inches

Width top (arm/ biceps):   approx. 22-36 cm/ 9-15 inches 
(measured around the biceps) 
                                                                                                               
Width bottom (hand):          max.  23 cm/ 9 inches
(Don't measure the wrist. It's the hand that has to pass through. So measure the circumference of palm with thumb. Note: the hem is not  elastic!)  
                                                                          

TEXTILE CARE
Handwash only
Do not tumble dry
Do not dry clean
Ironing at low temperature. 


CUSTOMER SERVICE
Ships worldwide from Switzerland at no extra shipping costs. 
Comes with a cute and careful packaging plus full care instructions.

name: Silk Neck Scarf "Non, Je Ne Regrette Rien", emerald
description:
Emerald in every shade is color of the year. If you don't feel like going for the all-over look, add a dash of it with a small scarf.    

A silk neck scarf with parisian chic, an Edith Piaf quote, a bit of vintage inspiration and lace print, a bold color like emerald, e voilà: time to flirt, ladies! Get playful with this silk accessory. You will surely draw some attention with it. 

Material: 100% Silk, Crêpe de Chine. 

Size: approx. 45x45cm/ 18x18 inches

Making: Digital Textile Print. Scarve edges have a narrow double-folded and straightstitched hem. 

Textile care: handwash only, do not tumble dry, do not dry clean, iron at low temperature.

Textile and Product Design by ZAFRÁN - Schnickschnack de Luxe. Printed in Germany. Handmade in Switzerland.

name: Sash Belt, Wide Waist Belt I Print Of Bright Dahlias I Contours Your Fab Figure I OH LA LA DAHLIA
description:
This Dahlia patterned wide belt, when wrapped around your waistline, is sure to embellish any outfit effortlessly.  Wear these flowers for an eternal summer feeling! Fitted for chic comfort and accentuated by a lustrous sash this colorful ladies accessory will delight you every time you wear it. 

Topping a flowing dress, a high-cut skirt or or a slim blouse the belt will adjust to your figure for a perfectly snug, waist-cinching fit. If you prefer a tightly tied sash, untighten the back buckle. If you like to wear the sash in a more loose way thighten the back buckle. 

The print looks like painted, but it actually is a collage of digital images which I personally took in botanical and gardens. 

I use a padded, soft, sophisticated knitted polyamide material to digitally print my original textile designs on. It perfectly serves the modern requirements for easy wear and easy care. 
The shaped border is hand cut. 

I developed, designed, printed, sewed and eventually photographed this item with utmost care. As with any handmade item in limited editions my pieces may have slight inconsistencies. Their colors might appear differently in reality than on your monitor. 

MATERIAL
Main: 100% Polyamide, Oeko Tex Standard 100 certified, fabric provides stretch
Sash: 100% Polyester
Buckle: nickel-free

MEASURES

For waist sizes from 66 – 82 cm / 26 – 32 inches

Length: approx.  132 cm/  52 inches
Sash: approx. 35 cm/ 14 inches each
Width (front): approx.  12,5cm/  5 inches 
Width (back): approx.  7 cm/  3 inches 
                                                                                                               
TEXTILE CARE
Handwash only
Do not tumble dry
Do not dry clean
Ironing at low temperature.

Comes with a cute and careful packaging plus full care instructions.

name: Long Gloves Arm Warmers I Orchid Print I Party, Festive Fashion, New Year's Eve, I NEXT STOP SAIGON
description:
Fingerless gloves with a blurred orchid print. They make you feel sensually exposed and yet artfully covered. Every time you slip your hands into the luxe soft material you'll  be deligted by the adorable large curved and scalloped edge with its elaborate hole pattern. 

Pair these extra long arm warmers  with a sheer black blouse, a lace dress or a sleevless satin top for ultimate tempting appeal! Not up for showing much skin (happens sometimes)? Slip the gloves down beneath the elbow for a different look. This way they look great with ¾ sleeves. 

You might find that the floral print looks like painted. It is not. It's actually is a photo print of a digital image that I personally took in a local  botanical garden's hothouse. 

I digitally print my original textile designs on a soft, sophisticated knitted polyamide material which perfectly serves the modern requirements for easy wear and easy care. The cuff on the upper end is invisible and encloses the arm without tightening. 

I developed, designed, printed, sewed and eventually photographed this item with utmost care. As with any handmade item in limited editions my pieces may have slight inconsistencies. Their colors might appear differently in reality than on your monitor.

name: Square Silk Foulard With "Spoonbill" Print
description:
A tropical paradise of palmtrees and birds on silk. Wrap this elegant large square scarf any way you like it. There'll always pop up one of these pretty pink birds, peeping out of one or the other fold. It's fun! 

This is a photo print. I took the image of the beetles myself as I do with all of my flora and fauna inspired designs. The photo is inspiration enough to lead me through the whole design process. I just let myself get carried away by the beauty of nature.    

Material: 100% Silk, Crêpe de Chine. 

Size: approx. 90x90cm/ 18.5x18.5 inches

name: Arm Warmers I Floral Print Of Red Poppies & Blue Love-In-A-Mist I Curved Edge I AH, MOHN AMOUR
description:
Arm warmers that carry the elegant look of fingerless gloves and still are easy and comfortable to wear: I created this fashion accessory to alter every outfit in no time at all. 
Vintage kimonos inspired me to combine the images of red Poppy and blue Love In A Mist with a graphical pattern and a contrasting black border (remark: „Mohn“ means Poppy in German, hence the item name „Ah, Mohn Amour“). The style goes very well with Asian or Boho influenced looks. 

The print looks like painted, but it actually is a collage of digital images which I personally took in botanical and not-so-botanical gardens. 
The black curved edge is hand-cut

I digitally print my original textile designs on a soft, sophisticated knitted polyamide material which perfectly serves the modern requirements for easy wear and easy care. The curved hemline adds grace and vintage charm to these ladies accessories.  The cuff on the upper end is invisible and encloses the arm without tightening. 

You can wear these arm warmers at full length with a short-sleeved tee, turtleneck or – very sexy  - a corset or a sleeveless garment. I encourage you to play around with the length. Slip them down beneath the elbow for a different look. This way they look great with ¾ sleeves. 

I developed, designed, printed, sewed and eventually photographed this item with utmost care. As with any handmade item in limited editions my pieces may have slight inconsistencies. Their colors might appear differently in reality than on your monitor.

name: Wide Waist Belt With Straps, Buckles and Lacing I Floral Print And Lace Pattern I LILIES AMARYLLIS
description:
Every eye will be caught by your waistline whenever you accentuate it with this wide waist belt. At first sight they'll notice an opulent floral print and lace pattern. Eventually they'll follow you for a veeery long time hypnotized by those silver charms dangling from the back lacing. They swing back and forth, back and forth, back and forth, back and...just this wee bit above your bum.

Topping a flowing dress, a high-cut skirt or a shirt-blouse the belt will adjust to your figure for a perfectly snug, waist-cinching fit by two buckled front straps and a back lacing. Play with both by thightening/ untightening for a perfect fit and look.  

The print looks like painted, but it actually is a collage of digital images which I personally took in botanical and not-so-botanical gardens. 

I use a padded, soft, sophisticated knitted polyamide material to digitally print my original textile designs on. It perfectly serves the modern requirements for easy wear and easy care. 
The shaped border is hand cut. 

I developed, designed, printed, sewed and eventually photographed this item with utmost care. As with any handmade item in limited editions my pieces may have slight inconsistencies. Their colors might appear differently in reality than on your monitor.

description:
Larger-than-life Iris printed on silk: this is a wowing piece. Wear it as a sash, a stola or in your hair, tie it around your neck, wear it with a black-and-white garment or mix-and-match it with other patterns: these huge flowers go with everything. They manage to be drama and understatement at the same time.    

This is a photo print. I took the image of the Iris myself as I do with all of my flora and fauna inspired designs. The photo is inspiration enough to lead me through the whole design process. I just let myself get carried away by the beauty of nature.

description:
Tres jolie! A silk neck scarf with a french phrase, a bit of vintage inspiration and lace, nougat and monaco blue, e voilà: time to flirt, ladies! Get playful with this silk accessory. And if someone asks you politiely, just answer: "Avec plaisir!". 

You'll find two Pantone spring colors 2013 featured in this neck scarf: Dusk Blue and Monaco Blue, which makes this accessory a beautiful match with the latest fashion. The background in color nougat is very flattering.

description:
These elbow length gloves add elegant nonchalance and a dash of emerald green and graphical pattern to your look. They work like arm warmers, while showing the grace of fingerless gloves. They're easy and comfortable to wear. I created this fashion accessory to alter every outfit in no time at all. 

The print looks like graphic art, but it actually is a collage of digital images from Jade Vine blossoms. I took these pictures this springtime at a botanical garden of my city. 

You may see all images and how they transfer into the pattern here on my website/ blog http://zafraniversum.com/en/2013/04/03/jadevine-emerald-creeper/

or here on Pinterest
http://www.pinterest.com/zafraniversum/jade-vine-emerald-creeper/

name: Silk Neck Scarf "I wanna be loved by you", orange
description:
Personally my rule of thumb is: at least one orange piece per wardrobe. Orange is uplifting, positive, warm energetic. Unsure about this bright color? Start with a scarf!    

A pure silk neck scarf patternd with white hearts, bright and optimistic orange and a Marilyn Monroe quote and here you go: time to flirt, ladies! Get playful with this silk accessory. You will surely draw some attention with it. Why don't you wear it at a first date?

name: Fingerless Glove With Lace-Like Pattern Of Delicate Flowers I Bridal Accessory I DEAR VICTORIA
description:
Printed faux-lace arm warmers. Delicate feathery pin cushion flowers appear to be a Victorian lace glove buttoned up by green globular buttons. The edge is curved and scalloped featuring a neatly punched hole pattern.

Pair them with a white lace garment for an over-the-top romantic style.
Are you the bride in pink? These are the gloves you want to wear on your wedding day.
Wear them with a black leather jacket (sleeves rolled up), black tank top, jeans and biker boots: leather & lace.
Combine these sweet arm warmers with n edgy and puristic blouse: sugar & spice.

I encourage you to play around with the item's length. You can either wear these arm warmers at full length.  Or slip them down beneath the elbow for a different look. This way they look great with ¾ sleeves. 

The print on these fingerless gloves looks like painted, but it actually is a collage of digital images which I personally took in the garden. The edge is scalloped and punched by hand. 

I digitally print my original textile designs on a soft, sophisticated knitted polyamide material which perfectly serves the modern requirements for easy wear and easy care. The cuff on the upper end is invisible and encloses the arm without tightening. 

I developed, designed, printed, sewed and eventually photographed this item with utmost care. As with any handmade item in limited editions my pieces may have slight inconsistencies. Their colors might appear differently in reality than on your monitor.

description:
There are many items claiming to be a statement piece. This candy pink (!) silk neck scarf featuring the lettering „Queen of fucking everything“ really IS one.    
Pay attention to the heart, mirror ball, globe and the lady in a girdle of flowers. They turn a women into the queen of hearts, the disco queen, queen of the world and a lady queen. Mark your position and dress wildly with this silk accessory.

description:
These arm warmers are arm charmers. They add lightness, elegance and grace to any outfit. And how playfully romantic are these scalloped edges embellished by a neat hole pattern! You'll love the way they flattern your wrist and hand.

The bride could wear these gloves with her off-white wedding dress.
The bridesmaid could wear them with their gowns.
The mother of the bride could pair them with her Chanel costume and pearl necklace.

In full bloom. A large printed silk foulard with a striking beautiful floral design featuring yellow Irises on a shimmering night blue and black fond. Take a close look at the petal patterns: aren't they just stunning?!  

The Deep Ink Iris scarf is an accessory made for every occassion. It works with every style. From casual to stylish to business outfit. The colors and pattern, the shimmering dark silk surely adorn every women.

name: Silk Neck Scarf "Non, Je Ne Regrette Rien", yellow
description:
This is the boldest variation of the five „Non, je ne regrette rien“ neck scarves. Made for women that really want to make a statement.    

Inspired by the great French singer Edith Piaf and her famous song this Secret Message Scarf features parisian chic, a bit of vintage inspiration, printed lace and a bold color like yellow. Voilà: time to flirt, ladies! Get playful with this silk accessory. You will surely draw some attention with it.

Material: 100% Silk, Crêpe de Chine. 

Size: approx. 45x45cm/ 18x18 inches

Making: Digital Textile Print. Scarve edges have a narrow double-folded and straightstitched hem.  

Textile care: handwash only, do not tumble dry, do not dry clean, iron at low temperature.

name: Arm Warmers Fingerless Gloves I Modern Hippie, Boho I Chrysanthemum I Tulip Edge I HEY PRECIOUS!
description:
Boho chic arm warmers featuring a pattern of three green Chrysanthemum on a dark blue background. The delicate sand-colored hemline is shaped like a tulip to accent the elegant modern Hippie style. 
Wear them alongside a flowing gown for holiday parties, a  brocade coat on an evening at the ballet or theater. Combine them with a sheer golden blouse with batwing sleeves to complete a dramatic look. Wear them either at full length or slip them down beneath the elbow for a different look. This way they look great with ¾ sleeves. 

The print on these fingerless gloves looks like painted, but it actually is a collage of digital images which I personally took. The inspiration for this particular pattern came through extensive listening to Florence Welch and the Machine (4 days in a row) and subsequent studies of Miss Welch's looks (didn't count the hours). 

I digitally print my original textile designs on a soft, sophisticated knitted polyamide material which perfectly serves the modern requirements for easy wear and easy care. The cuff on the upper end is invisible and encloses the arm without tightening. 

I developed, designed, printed, sewed and eventually photographed this item with utmost care. As with any handmade item in limited editions my pieces may have slight inconsistencies. Their colors might appear differently in reality than on your monitor. 


MATERIAL
Main: 100% Polyamide, Oeko Tex Standard 100 certified, fabric provides stretch
Hem: 100% Polyester

MEASURES AND HOW TO MEASURE
Length:                                   approx. 36 cm/ 15 inches

Width top (arm/ biceps):   approx. 22-36 cm/ 9-15 inches 
(measured around the biceps) 
                                                                                                               
Width bottom (hand):          max.  23 cm/ 9 inches
(Don't measure the wrist. It's the hand that has to pass through. So measure the circumference of palm with thumb. Note: the hem is not  elastic!)  
                                                                          

TEXTILE CARE
Handwash only
Do not tumble dry
Do not dry clean
Ironing at low temperature. 


CUSTOMER SERVICE
Ships worldwide from Switzerland at no extra shipping costs. 
Comes with a cute and careful packaging plus full care instructions.

name: Bold Patterned Waist Belt I White, Black, Green, Iceblue I With Buckles And Lacing I DIGITAL IKAT
description:
This is a loud statement piece of a waist belt. The Ikat pattern goes POW! People go WOW! And the charms on the back are jingeling when you walk. 

This waist cincher loves a powerful counterpart. An androgynous look for example. Or an fancy dress. The belt will adjust to your figure for a perfectly snug, waist-cinching fit by two buckled black front straps and a back lacing. Play with both by thightening/ untightening for a perfect fit and look.  

I use a padded, soft, sophisticated knitted polyamide material to digitally print my original textile designs on. It perfectly serves the modern requirements for easy wear and easy care. 
The shaped border is hand cut.

description:

Inspired by the great French singer Edith Piaf and her famous song this Secret Message Scarf features parisian chic, a bit of vintage inspiration and printed lace.

name: Large Silk Foulard With "Beetles On Parade" Print
description:
Very graphical at first sight this silk scarf reaveals its funny and whimsical pattern when you take a closer look at the stringed beetles. Can you see them shaping a man's face wearing a moustache? Take a very close look...it's kind of surrealistic.                                                         

This is a photo print. I took the image of the beetles myself as I do with all of my flora and fauna inspired designs. The photo is inspiration enough to lead me through the whole design process. I just let myself get carried away by the beauty of nature.    

Material: 100% Silk, Crêpe de Chine.

name: Romantic Fingerless Gloves I Floral Print I Bridal Accessory, Bridesmaid, Wedding I LOOK IT'S IRIS!
description:
A cheerful bright design of multicolored Iris patterns this fun romantic accessory.  Long arm warmers with a large curved and scalloped edge plus a neat hole pattern.

These fingerless gloves want to be your alltime companion. They're with you in autumn giving your casual denim-and-turtleneck-outfit a girlish and colorful touch. 
They cover your arms in wintertime when you're indoors at work. 
They'll keep you from catching a cold in springtime when you got too excited over the first rays of sunlight and put on your summer dress. 
They'll complete your lovely bridesmaid gown at your best friends wedding. 
They'll even travel with you to faraway countries and warm your arms on chilly summer nights.

I encourage you to play around with the item's length. You can either wear these arm warmers at full length.  Or slip them down beneath the elbow for a different look. This way they look great with ¾ sleeves. 

The print on these fingerless gloves looks like painted, but it actually is a collage of digital images which I personally took in the garden. The edge is scalloped and punched by hand. 

I digitally print my original textile designs on a soft, sophisticated knitted polyamide material which perfectly serves the modern requirements for easy wear and easy care. The cuff on the upper end is invisible and encloses the arm without tightening. 

I developed, designed, printed, sewed and eventually photographed this item with utmost care. As with any handmade item in limited editions my pieces may have slight inconsistencies. Their colors might appear differently in reality than on your monitor.

(measured around the biceps)

(Don't measure the wrist. It's the hand that has to pass through. So measure the circumference of palm with thumb. Note: the hem is not  elastic!)

name: Floral Patterned Waspie I Coral And Prune I Purple Flowers I With Buckles and Lacing I DARK IRIS
description:
An eyecatching waist cincher, any way you look at it. The coral red front straps and the prune print fond make a lovely contrast. In the back there are those silver charms dangling from the lacing. They swing back and forth, back and forth, back and forth, back and...just this wee bit above your bum.

Topping a tight dress, a high-cut skirt or a slim turtle-neck the belt will adjust to your figure for a perfectly snug, waist-cinching fit by two buckled front straps and a back lacing. Play with both by thightening/ untightening for a perfect fit and look.  

The print looks like painted, but it actually is a collage of digital images which I personally took in a local botanical garden. 

I use a padded, soft, sophisticated knitted polyamide material to digitally print my original textile designs on. It perfectly serves the modern requirements for easy wear and easy care. 
The shaped border is hand cut. 

I developed, designed, printed, sewed and eventually photographed this item with utmost care. As with any handmade item in limited editions my pieces may have slight inconsistencies. Their colors might appear differently in reality than on your monitor.

description:
So preppy and so appetizing at the same time. Poppy red, white and lots of hearts: can it get more inviting? This is THE accessory for a first date. By the way poppy red  is one of the Pantone Colors for spring/ summer 2013.     

A pure silk neck scarf. A Marilyn Monroe quote. Poppy red hearts preppily mixed with off white. You can not possibly look more invinting and appetizing! As yummie as a cupcake. This is definitely a piece you should wear for a date.

Pay attention to the heart, mirror ball, globe and the lady in a girdle of flowers. They turn a women into the queen of hearts, the disco queen, queen of the world and a lady queen. Mark your position and dress wildly with this silk accessory. And yes: the color is ROYAL BLUE. Of Course.
